document_data.name: Lai Antolio
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite web/GTM Icons of the Realms: SKT}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Lai "Line" Antolio''' was a [[giant-killer|giantslayer]] and skilled maker of contraptions who roamed around the [[Savage Frontier]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Lai was quite a high-strung individual, being a perfectionist when it came to his contraptions. Most of his time was spent thinking his next trap or technique for giantslaying.
document_data.History: Some time after the shattering of the [[Ordning (social structure)|Ordning]] in [[1485 DR]], when the Savage Frontier became a hotbed of squabbling [[giant]] activity, Lai joined up with two other [[adventurer]]s to form a giantslayer organization — [[Hook, Line, and Sinker (organization)|Hook, Line, and Sinker]].
